GameParticipant.name: GameParticipant
GameParticipant.description: Represents a junction between a game definition and a participant who is either an account, a contact, or a loyalty program member.

AccountId.description: ID of the participant’s account that’s associated with the game definition.

ContactId.description: ID of the participant’s contact that’s associated with the game definition.

GameDefinitionId.description: ID of the game definition that has been assigned to the participant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: ID of the participant’s loyalty program member record that’s associated with the game definition.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

ParticipantId.description: ID of the participant’s contact, account, or loyalty program member record.
